org.springframework.kafka.support.converter

类 StringJsonMessageConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.kafka.support.converter.MessagingMessageConverter
      • org.springframework.kafka.support.converter.StringJsonMessageConverter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    MessageConverter, RecordMessageConverter

    public class StringJsonMessageConverter
extends MessagingMessageConverter
    JSON Message converter - String on output, String or byte[] on input.
